title: Who are the women you find so beautiful and attractive that you can keep looking at them? - Quora

response.answer_text: As Alia Bhatt is already mentioned in the answers I'd like to list my top favorites.  1. Dia Mirza.  Enough said, she's undoubtedly the most beautiful actress.           ​​​​​​​​​​    ​​​​     ​​​​​​     ​​​​​​​​​​     ​​​​​​​​​​   ​​​       ​​​​​​​      ​​​​​​​​​​      ​​​​​​​​​​       ​​​​​​​​​​      ​​​​​​​​​​      ​​​​​​​​​​  Amazing in one word.  2. Yami Gautam.  Her smile is infectious       ​​​​​​​​​​    ​​​​​​​​​​     ​​​​​​​​​​     ​​​​​​​​​​     ​​​​​​​​​​  3. Shraddha Kapoor.  Although she's not a very good actress but she's super cute.       ​​​​​​​​​​     ​​​​​​​​​​     ​​​​​​​​​​     ​​​​​​​​​​     ​​​​​​​​​​     ​​​​​​​​​​     ​​​​​​​​​​Image source : Google and Facebook.  Edit 1 : Here's adding one more beauty to the list.  Disha Patani.  Remember that cute girl from dairy milk silk advertisement?  Well, refresh your memory guys, as she's worth it.    ​    ​    ​    ​ Turns out she got more cute with time.    ​ Those eyes (insert love emoji here)    ​ And the smile *gasp * just love it.    ​ I can seriously go on and on looking at her.     ​    ​ That innocence <3    ​ Turns out she can carry any look.    ​    ​ And sometimes, she's just your girl next door ;)    ​   ​ Did I mention how beautiful her eyes are?  And guess who's she sleeping with?    ​ Our favorite anime character :P yeah goku!!  Isn't she perfect guys,  I just love her.  All the images are from Facebook, Google and Instagram.

Keep looking at them? You have mentioned two terms: She must be a actressShe should be beautiful and attractive.I wonder why no one has yet mentioned Tapsee Pannu! She is such a beauty! Super Hot & the most beautiful actress with one of the best smiles I've ever seen! She is the reason I watch south Indian movies.  Hold your breath, folks!  That smile! <3 I will die hundred times for her!  Photo from a press conference.  Who else wants a bride like her?  Tapsee in a movie promotion:  This photo almost killed me..  Do you still think that Deepika Padukone and Katrina Kaif are hottest actresses of bollywood? I bet you that you kept looking at every photo in my answer. Isn't she the most attractive woman in this whole quora question too?;-) Know more about her: Image source: taapsee pannu - Google Image SearchTapsee Pannu wikipedia: Taapsee PannuTapsee's Facebook Page: Taapsee Pannu Tapsee's official Website: http://www.tapsee.me And, she is also the most educated actress! (Thank you N Vishnu Raju for this!)
